items.sentence: Could you tell me how to get to Tom's house?
Tom is a dim-witted but good-hearted fellow.
Tom was diagnosed with autoimmune hepatitis.
A snowflake landed on the tip of Tom's nose.
It'll be three weeks before I see you again.
I can't believe Tom really wants to do that.
I drink at least three cups of coffee a day.
I've already sung three folks songs tonight.
We need more people like Tom working for us.
Tom wants to learn how to cook Chinese food.
I've asked Tom several times not to do that.
I wasn't the one who told Tom what happened.
I've never lived anywhere other than Boston.
I'm going to miss being the mayor of Boston.
It's been nearly three years since Tom left.
Tom paid someone to help him move the piano.
Tom has done something really bad this time.
I don't know whether Tom plans to go or not.
Do you think Tom was the one who stole that?
Who did Tom think was going to win the race?
Who did Tom say he wanted to go skiing with?
Don't you want Tom punished for what he did?
Tom is going to be mad at us for doing this.
Shouldn't we be doing something to help Tom?
Tom has been like this for a very long time.
Tom has been in prison for a very long time.
Tom has been working for us for three years.
Tom promised not to go out after dark alone.
Tom usually comes home pretty late at night.
Tom noticed Mary looking down at the ground.
Is there anyone here who hasn't yet met Tom?
Tom would never ever do something like that.
I was hoping you'd know what to do with Tom.
I have something I need to discuss with Tom.
I really think we should be honest with Tom.
Do you know how I can get in touch with Tom?
The last time I saw Tom was three weeks ago.
Why don't you go over there and talk to Tom?
Both Tom and Mary talked to John about that.
It's just been a difficult few days for Tom.
I haven't heard from Tom in quite some time.
Tom has been waiting here for quite a while.
I'm sure Tom wouldn't want to offend anyone.
Tom seems to be the only one who isn't here.
Tom got home just as we were about to leave.
Tom looked at Mary, but didn't say anything.
I've got to make sure Tom does his homework.
Tom didn't realize what was expected of him.
I don't like the way Tom decorated his room.
Tom asked Mary how to turn off the computer.
I'm fairly certain Tom lives on Park Street.
Tom knows how to deal with people like Mary.
Tom has been telling everyone you hate Mary.
We were all surprised when Tom won the race.
Tom didn't really feel like drinking coffee.
I think you should tell Tom why you're here.
Tom stayed with us for several days in 2013.
I met Tom when I was a sophomore at Harvard.
I've never met anyone quite like Tom before.
I think it's time we gave Tom some time off.
Perhaps Tom can help you with your homework.
I wonder where Tom is spending his vacation.
I was going to call and tell Tom everything.
I told Tom I'd be there as soon as possible.
I told Tom a lot of things I shouldn't have.
I hope Tom will tell me what I need to know.
I have something very important to tell Tom.
Have you told Tom why you can't drive a car?
Did you tell Tom about where you went today?
Tom sat down on his bed to put on his socks.
Tom was unable to take his eyes off of Mary.
We're going to go camping with Tom and Mary.
We're getting married three months from now.
We shouldn't have left Tom there by himself.
We were doing just fine before Tom got here.
How did you end up living in Tom's basement?
Can you think of anyone Tom might know here?
I've been thinking about Tom a lot recently.
Do you think Tom knew you were lying to him?
I just need to find out why Tom didn't come.
If Tom can do it, I'm sure I can do it, too.
Let's hope we find Tom before the police do.
Tom will be in Boston by this time tomorrow.
Tom isn't as intelligent as you might think.
Tom wasn't the drunkest person at the party.
Tom may not make it in time for the meeting.
Tom hasn't been the same since the accident.
Tom has been waiting for Mary all afternoon.
Tom went to live with his brother in Boston.
Tom has been depressed ever since Mary died.
We're doing exactly what Tom asked us to do.
Tom will be arriving in Boston this evening.
What do you think Tom was running away from?
I've never seen Tom acting like this before.
Tom has never been able to beat me at chess.
I think I might know where Tom put the keys.
What we have to do is persuade Tom to leave.
Tom and Mary did almost everything together.
Tom had a hard time keeping a straight face.
Tom put his spoon down and picked up a fork.
